name: Apollo.io Sales Intelligence
description: Integrate with Apollo.io Sales Intelligence to search, enrich, search and more.
author: agenticmail

tools.name: Search People
tools.description: Search for people in Apollo.io database. Filter by job title, company, location, and more.

tools.name: Enrich Person
tools.description: Enrich a person record in Apollo.io. Provide an email, LinkedIn URL, or name + company to get detailed information.

tools.name: Search Organizations
tools.description: Search for organizations (companies) in Apollo.io database. Filter by industry, size, location, and more.

tools.name: Create Contact
tools.description: Create a new contact in your Apollo.io account. Provide at least an email address.

tools.name: List Sequences
tools.description: List email sequences in your Apollo.io account.
